authors: Baleine, from the original sheet by Mago
instructions:
Character Sheet designed to play **Warhammer 40k Deathwatch** pen & paper RPG by Fantasy Flight Games.

This Sheet does Not require API scripts.

Most of the sheets functions are described with **Info Tooltips** hover over fields and buttons to see them

For more information visit the documentation page at [Deathwatch Improved Wiki](https://wiki.roll20.net/Deathwatch_improved)

**IMPORTANT TIP** The roll template is best displayed in chat when **turning off the ENABLE CHAT AVATARS** option in the My Settings tab.

If you have any questions, suggestions or feedback, send a private message to [Author Baleine](https://app.roll20.net/users/4735202/baleine) or [Author Mago](https://app.roll20.net/users/986445/mago)

**Revision 1 November 2024**
